price: And We left there a sign[9] for those who fear the painful punishment.
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
footnotes: [9] i.e., the ruins of Sodom or the Dead Sea in Palestine, as a lesson for people.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
